alert.note: Alert for Coastal Taylor; Inland Dixie; Inland Taylor; Lafayette (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 9:23AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Lafayette, northwestern Dixie and eastern Taylor Counties through 1015 AM EDT... At 923 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles west of Dowling Park to 15 miles northwest of Steinhatchee. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Mayo, Pinland, Tennille, Jug Island, Clara, Buckville, Jack Lee Island, Foley, Salem, San Pedro Junction, Cedar Island, Fish Creek, Cooks Hammock, Howell Place, Chancey, Smith, Carbur, Alton, Mayo Junction and Townsend. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Taylor; Inland Dixie; Inland Taylor; Lafayette
